name: Glittering Creek
description:
You haven't been able to continue your alchemy studies since the last mage moved out of your quaint little town, but a new mage has just moved to Glittering Creek!

Hopefully you can become their apprentice and hone your magical abilities, and maybe along the way you can help the mage learn a thing or two about themself.

This game is best played with a mouse and keyboard

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Interact - E/Space

Choose answer & select potion ingredients - Left mouse button

Credits:

Bubble Bunny Gaming - Narrative, Writing, Design

EyeOracular - Art, Music

Flozza_Bee - Programming, Art, Design

With additional assets from

  • Kenney - 1 bit input prompts, 1 bitpack
  • Estúdio Vaca Roxa - Generic RPG Pack
  • DoubleGum - Daydream
